hero.title: Building the future of
hero.description: We're a team of AI engineers on a mission to make computer vision accessible to every team. Born from frustration with fragmented tools, Picsellia is the platform we wished existed.

mission.title: From experiments to production, without the chaos
paragraphs: In 2019, as AI engineers building computer vision systems, we faced a common frustration: the tools we needed didn't exist. Data management was scattered across folders. Experiments were tracked in spreadsheets. Deployment was a nightmare of custom scripts.

We built Picsellia to solve these problems—not as consultants or enterprise software veterans, but as practitioners who lived the pain every day. Our platform is shaped by real-world experience deploying CV models at scale.
Today, Picsellia helps teams worldwide turn fragmented workflows into streamlined pipelines. From labeling to monitoring, every feature exists because we needed it ourselves.
mission.quote: Picsellia is the kind of tool we had wished existed during our early development work. We built it to close the operational gaps across the entire computer vision lifecycle.

values.title: Our values
values.description: These principles guide everything we build and how we work with our customers.

engineerFirst.title: Engineer-First
engineerFirst.description: Built by ML engineers who understand the daily challenges of production AI. Every feature solves a real problem we faced ourselves.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Full visibility into your ML pipeline. Reproducible experiments, complete data lineage, and no black boxes. You own your data.

flexibility.title: Flexibility
flexibility.description: Deploy anywhere—cloud, hybrid, or on-premise. Use your existing tools. Picsellia adapts to your infrastructure, not the other way around.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: Powerful features without complexity. Our platform reduces cognitive load so teams can focus on building great AI, not managing tools.

items.title: Founded
items.description: Picsellia founded in Toulouse, France by two AI engineers

items.title: First Funding
items.description: Seed funding from Acequia Capital and early backers

items.title: Series Seed
items.description: $1.94M raised led by Axeleo Capital to accelerate growth

items.title: 1K+ Users
items.description: Crossed 1,000 global users and 500+ models trained

items.title: Atlas Launch
items.description: Launched Atlas, our open-source AI agent for VisionAI

thibautLucas.name: Thibaut Lucas
thibautLucas.bio: Former AI engineer who experienced firsthand the challenges of deploying computer vision in production. Founded Picsellia to build the tools he wished existed.

pierreNicolasTiffreau.name: Pierre-Nicolas Tiffreau
pierreNicolasTiffreau.bio: Deep expertise in ML infrastructure and scalable systems. Leads the technical vision and architecture of the Picsellia platform.

team.title: Built by a small, focused team
team.description: Based in Toulouse, France, with team members and clients around the world.

investors.title: Our investors
investors.description: We've raised $3.45M from leading European investors who share our vision for the future of MLOps.

location.title: Headquartered in Toulouse
location.description: Known as the European capital of aerospace, Toulouse is home to a thriving tech ecosystem and some of the world's most innovative engineering talent. Our team works from here, serving clients across Europe, North America, and beyond.

cta.title: Ready to build with us?
cta.description: See how Picsellia can transform your computer vision workflow. Start with a free trial or talk to our team.
